sentences.english: Did you have any trouble finding your way here?
Can't you just stick it on the turnpike and give it money for tolls ?
sentences.chinese: 就不能把路费给它，让它自己从收费公路上过来吗？

sentences.english: We passed what we thought was an inoperative road toll.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过我们的想法是一不能实行养路费。

sentences.english: Any amount of HMT of less than one yuan shall be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 养路费费额不足一元的部分不计。

sentences.english: Because of her travelling expenses and lack of food, she came to the gate to sing for money.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺少路费，又没有吃的，她就到雍门唱歌筹钱。

sentences.english: The hike costs￡2,500 including all flights and accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 旅行费用为2，500英镑，包括所有路费和食宿费。

sentences.english: Any vehicle whose owner has failed to pay HMT is forbidden to get access to the highway.
sentences.chinese: 未按照规定缴纳养路费的机动车，不得上路行驶。

sentences.english: Atriplex spilled toll left of this line it?
sentences.chinese: 那满地的榆钱是此行留下的路费吗？

sentences.english: Photo ID: changsha0342. A pregnant kneel down for help.
sentences.chinese: 我家楼下一个孕妇跪求路费。

sentences.english: If you have fuel trucks, they are going to charge you more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你车上装的是燃油，他们会多收过路费。
过路费从20美元到80美元不等。

sentences.english: Do you know the toll fee is not included in the fare?
sentences.chinese: 您知道车费里不包括过路费吗？

sentences.english: A second set up illegal checkpoints to collects tolls around Gardez.
sentences.chinese: 也有人在加德兹地区非法设立关卡收取过路费。

sentences.english: Pining for trip to space, but can't afford the ride? There is another option.
sentences.chinese: 想去太空旅行，又没钱付路费？或许有别的办法。

definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
